Keep in the Know
Welcome to the official Falconium News Page! Here, you can keep in the know about the latest developments
relating to our E-Sports team, or the E-Sports scene in your favorite games!
Moreover, you can also keep in touch with the latest products that are rolling out, and the latest benchmarks of the latest PC Components, as they are released!
So, if you are a PC enthusiast, you have indeed come to the right place!
The tale of the Tape
As shown in the video, the iGPU is shown to greatly exceed expectations, and even allows playing of many Triple A titles at 30+ FPS, reaching 60 FPS in GTA V. The iGPU offers an average of :

  • 68 FPS in Doom Eternal at 1080p Medium
  • 60 FPS in the Original Skyrim with some dips
  • 42 FPS in Rift apart, but 60+ with frame-gen
  • 40 FPS in Tomb Raider - this was rather disappointing.
  • Around 60 FPS in Fallout 4 1080p Medium
  • 120 + FPS in Overwatch 2 1080p Low-Medium - this was impressive indeed.
  • Around 40 FPS in Spiderman, 1080p MED, over 60 with frame-gen
  • 42 FPS in Cyberpunk 2077 1080p Low - this was particularly impressive as this game is very GPU-intensive
Even some of the more demanding games, such as Cyberpunk 2077 can run at 60 FPS with frame-gen and low settings, which is very impressive.
